channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Live: NASCAR Xfinity Racing Series
channel.desc: The NASCAR Xfinity Series finishes the Round of 8 with the IAA and Ritchie Bros. 250 at Martinsville. Two spots remain in the Championship 4 after Justin Allgaier and Connor Zilisch clinched berths at Talladega last week in a race won by Austin Hill.
